title: Exciting News: Malpensa Airport in MSFS getting a massive makeover!
description:
Milan Malpensa Airport (LIMC) has recently been updated in MSFS, enhancing its realism with added details. As the largest international airport in Northern Italy, it serves the regions of Lombardy, Piedmont, and Liguria, along with the Swiss Canton of Ticino. Located 49 kilometers northwest of Milan, it lies adjacent to the Ticino River, which borders Lombardy and Piedmont.

For a full overview of items added to the marketplace this week have a look at the video below:
https://youtu.be/Ul7-KiVO7wI
